title: Cincinnati Bengals Best Bet In AFC; Denver Broncos best open coaching position and other coaching nuggets (Brady Quinn Football Show 01/12)
description:
Who's the best bet in the AFC playoffs? According to Will Brinson and Brady Quinn, it's the Cincinnati Bengals. The discussion evolves into a new game on the show called "read between the lines", where Brady gives his insight on the latest headlines in the NFL football world. 


(08:13) The Bengals are the best bet in the AFC
(19:26) The Steelers are a bad bet in the AFC playoffs
(26:21) Denver is the best coaching opening this offseason
(34:22) Baker is a lame duck QB next season
(38:56) Matt Rhule is on an island
(43:00) Joe Judge is in Trouble (recorded Tuesday afternoon)
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
